scripts.dev: npm run compile && cross-env VITE_MARKCOIN_BUSINESS_ID=${id} vite --open --mode test
scripts.dev:windows: npm run compile && cross-env VITE_MARKCOIN_BUSINESS_ID=${id} vite --open --mode test
scripts.build:test:desktop: npm run compile && cross-env VITE_MARKCOIN_BUSINESS_ID=${id} NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 --NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode test
scripts.build:test: npm run compile && cross-env VITE_GIT_COMMIT_ID=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_MARKCOIN_BUSINESS_ID=${id} NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 --NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode test
scripts.build:prod:desktop: npm run compile && cross-env VITE_MARKCOIN_BUSINESS_ID=${id} NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 --NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode production
scripts.build:prod: npm run compile && cross-env VITE_GIT_COMMIT_ID=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)  VITE_MARKCOIN_BUSINESS_ID=${id} NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 --NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode production
scripts.build: npm run compile && cross-env VITE_MARKCOIN_BUSINESS_ID=${id} NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 --NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode ci
scripts.tauri:dev:plus: cross-env id=240040 npm run icon:plus && tauri dev --config ./src-tauri/plus.dev.config.json
scripts.tauri:build:plus:test: cross-env id=240040 npm run icon:plus && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.test.config.json
scripts.tauri:build:plus:prod: cross-env id=240040 npm run icon:plus && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.prod.config.json
scripts.tauri:build:test:m1: npm run icon && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.test.config.json  --target aarch64-apple-darwin --verbose
scripts.tauri:build:test:intel: npm run icon && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.test.config.json  --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.tauri:build:test:32: npm run icon && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.test.config.json  --target i686-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:test:64: npm run icon && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.test.config.json  --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:plus:test:m1: npm run icon:plus && cross-env id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.test.config.json  --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.tauri:build:plus:test:intel: npm run icon:plus && cross-env id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.test.config.json  --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.tauri:build:plus:test:32: npm run icon:plus && cross-env id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.test.config.json  --target i686-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:plus:test:64: npm run icon:plus && cross-env id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.test.config.json  --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:prod:m1: npm run icon && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.prod.config.json  --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.tauri:build:prod:intel: npm run icon && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.prod.config.json  --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.tauri:build:prod:32: npm run icon && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.prod.config.json  --target i686-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:prod:64: npm run icon && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ tauri build --config ./src-tauri/base.prod.config.json  --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:plus:prod:m1: npm run icon:plus && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.prod.config.json  --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.tauri:build:plus:prod:intel: npm run icon:plus && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.prod.config.json  --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.tauri:build:plus:prod:32: npm run icon:plus && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.prod.config.json  --target i686-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:plus:prod:64: npm run icon:plus && cross-env TAURI_PRIVATE_ id=240040 tauri build --config ./src-tauri/plus.prod.config.json  --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:all:windows: npm run tauri:build:prod:32 && npm run tauri:build:prod:64
scripts.tauri:all:mac: npm run tauri:build:prod:m1 && npm run tauri:build:prod:intel
scripts.tauri:all:plus:windows: npm run tauri:build:plus:prod:32 && npm run tauri:build:plus:prod:64
scripts.tauri:all:plus:mac: npm run tauri:build:plus:prod:m1 && npm run tauri:build:plus:prod:intel
